description: Disease diagnosis involves identifying a disease based on various symptoms, test results, and other relevant data. It is crucial in both medical and agricultural fields to ensure timely and accurate treatment or intervention.
you_have_this_if: You are trying to identify a specific disease based on symptoms or test results.
You have access to multiple data sources (e.g., images, lab results).
You need to improve the accuracy of existing diagnostic methods.
You are working under time constraints for diagnosis.
You are integrating diagnostic capabilities into an application.

approaches.best_for: when you need to diagnose plant diseases accurately using multiple data sources.
approaches.key_tradeoff: Offers high accuracy but may require extensive data preprocessing.

approaches.best_for: when you need to diagnose diseases from blood tests quickly in a healthcare application.
approaches.key_tradeoff: Provides fast results but may sacrifice some diagnostic accuracy.

decision_matrix.best_when: You have high-quality images and multiple data sources for plant disease diagnosis.
You need quick diagnosis from blood tests in a clinical setting.

start_here: The recommended first approach for most cases is the Smart Medical Report Algorithm, especially if you are focused on speed and integrating into healthcare applications.
